sentence.text: Renal clearance measurements of PAH cannot be made with any significant accuracy in patients receiving sulfonamides, procaine, or thiazolesulfone.
sentence.negationtags: <xcope> Renal clearance measurements of PAH <cue>cannot</cue> be made </xcope> with any significant accuracy in patients receiving sulfonamides, procaine, or thiazolesulfone.

sentence.text: These compounds interfere with chemical color development essential to the analytical procedures.
Probenecid depresses tubular secretion of certain weak acids such as PAH.
Therefore, patients receiving probenecid will have erroneously low ERPF and Tm PAH values.
